lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: After twenty years with Laban, what did God say to Jacob?
answers: Return home; I’ll be with you

questions.text: What did the messengers tell Jacob?

answers: That God would remember his promise and keep him safe from Esau
That he could stay with Laban
That Esau would leave him alone

questions.text: What gift did Jacob give to Esau? Why?
answers: Over 500 animals; he wanted to get on Esau’s good side

questions.text: What happened to Jacob the night before he met Esau?
answers: He packed up all his belongings

questions.text: What did the stranger do to Jacob as they wrestled?
answers: Touched his hip and knocked it out of place

questions.text: What did Jacob do as they wrestled?
answers: Held on; wouldn’t let go until the stranger blessed him
Ran away as fast as he could

questions.text: What new name did the stranger give to Jacob? What does it mean?
answers: Israel; it means Struggles with God
Abraham; it means Father of Many

questions.text: What did Jacob say the next morning? What did Jacob name the place?
answers: I saw God face to face and lived; Peniel, which means Face of God
I survived the night; Shiloh, meaning Peace
God has visited me; Bethel, meaning House of God
This place is blessed; Mahanaim, meaning Two Camps

questions.text: What happened when Jacob met Esau?
answers: Esau hugged him; was glad to see him
Esau attacked him with his soldiers
Esau challenged him to a fight
